reviews.review_msg: new prof, nice lady but has no clue how to teach class.she comes from italy so her style is very boring,old-fashioned,etc.Easy marker but the class is 4hrs and it is by far the most boring class ive ever taken.ask any1 in her class.Every class consists of a book review for 4hrs.no joke.and she gives u just one 10min break!!She really needs some hel
